about_the_game:
Contains 1600 new puzzles of Connect Dots and 1580 new puzzles of Trace Path

Connect Dots:
  • Color Pairs (240 levels)
  • Milk Tea (240 levels)
  • Coffee Milk (240 levels)
  • Volleyball (180 levels)
  • Number Link (240 levels)
  • Homecoming (120 levels)
  • Turn Once (160 levels)
  • Rectslider (180 levels)

Trace Path:
  • Pure Loop (320 levels)
  • Entry Exit (320 levels)
  • Linesweeper (240 levels)
  • Moon Sun Loop (180 levels)
  • Koburin (180 levels)
  • Country Road (180 levels)
  • Black White Loop (160 levels)

# The new levels are evenly distributed in each size and difficulty.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
